K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-11: mi mthun pas ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-12: yang dag pas 'tsho ba yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-13: log pas 'tsho ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-14: de chos kyis longs spyod thob pa de dag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-15: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom pa mang zhing snying po len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-17: pha ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-23: zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yang dag pa'i longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-27: snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur sti dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-28: gang du yang chos la 'dzud pas gtong ba 'phel bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-30: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-32: sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:7b-35: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dor bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-1: can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-2: bdag bde ba la mi chags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-3: sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-11: sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-12: rnyed pa dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas mi snyems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-13: rnyed pa dang grags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-14: brjod pa'i sgra'i snyan pa med pa la yi mi 'chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-15: shin tu brtags te las byed pa dang; yang dag par bsgrub pa kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-16: log par bsgrub pa la yid mi mos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-17: mi gnas pa'i blos 'byung ba mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-18: shing bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu'i sems med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-19: ji ltar dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-20: gzhan gyi bya ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-21: rang gi bya ba yongs su 'dor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-22: gzhan la byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs par mi re ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-23: gnod par byas pa la sha mi ldon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-26: legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-27: dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-28: stobs dang ldan pa rnams nga rgyal bcag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8a-29: 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs par dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-0: mya ngan gyis nyam thag pa @8b rnams la mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-1: mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-2: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-3: bla ma rnams la gus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-4: mang du thos pa rnams la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-5: mkhas pa rnams la kun 'dri ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-7: g-yo med par spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-9: bcos pa med par sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-10: dge ba gang yin zhes tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-11: mang du thos pa la chog mi shes par byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-12: brtsam pa rnams la yi dam brtan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-13: 'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-14: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-16: mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-18: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-19: thos pa'i don rjes su bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-20: 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba thams cad la mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-21: lus la mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-22: srog la zil pa'i thigs pa ltar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-23: longs spyod la sgyu ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-24: smig rgyu lta bur 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-25: bu dang chung ma la sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:8b-26: zhing dang khyim gyi las kyi mtha' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-0: gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa la @9a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-1: phongs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-2: yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'jig par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-3: khyim gyi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-7: snag gi mnyen mtshams rnams la sems can dmyal ba'i srung mar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-8: nyin dang mtshan du bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ces yongs su 'jal bar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-9: snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-10: snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-11: snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-12: de la snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-13: gang gzhan gyi bya ba cog bya bar spro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-14: bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-19: 'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-20: de la snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-21: gang sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su mi nyams la gong du yang rnam par 'phel ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9a-22: 'di ni snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-0: de la snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams @9b las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-1: gang ser sna'i sems tshar gcod cing gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-2: 'di ni snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-4: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang 'di lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa'i las 'di dag byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-5: skyes bu ngan pa'i las ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-6: de ltar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-10: sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dam bcas pa yang yongs su mi nyams pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-14: bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung nas des srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-18: snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-19: srog chags 'byung po thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-20: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-21: rtag tu byams pa la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-22: des ma byin par len pa spang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-23: bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:9b-24: gzhan gyi longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-0: chags pa dang brnab sems med @10a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-2: gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-3: tha na rtsva dang lo ma tsam yang ma byin par mi blang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-4: des 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-5: rang gi chung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-6: gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-7: ma chags pa'i mig gis blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-9: 'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du ma chags pa yid la byed pa la brtson par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-10: de gang gi tshe rang gi chung ma la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-11: des rang gi chung ma la mi sdug par rjes su lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-12: skrag pa'i yid kyis 'dod pa bsten par bya yi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-13: zhen pas zin bzhin du ni ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-17: mi gtsang bar 'du shes pas des ci nas bdag gis yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa la spyod par mi bya na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-19: yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-20: bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-21: des brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-23: yang dag par smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-24: ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-26: bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-27: dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-28: ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10a-29: chos rjes su bsrung bar gyur pa des lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du rdzun smra bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-1: sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-2: de ra ro ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-9: dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-10: shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-11: des na bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-13: skom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-14: des gzhan dag la chang yang byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-15: 'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-16: gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-18: gang dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-19: gang 'di 'khrul pa med pa'i longs spyod pa la de dang de dag dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-21: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-23: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gzhan dag la chang byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes pa brjod pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:10b-25: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-0: des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag kyang @11a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-2: gang du yang des phra ma mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-3: bye ba rnams kyi bsdums bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-4: des ngag rtsub mo yang mi smra bar bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-5: des ngag 'jam por smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-8: tshig kyal pa yang smra bar mi bya zhing dus su smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-9: yang dag par smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-15: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-16: des brnab sems su mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-17: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bsam par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-18: gnod sems su mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-19: rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-20: des yang dag par blta bar bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-21: log pa phyin ci log tu lta ba thams cad dang bral bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-22: lhar sangs rgyas bsam pa rjes su song zhing lha gzhan mi 'dzin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-24: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa grong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-28: ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa der /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-29: des sems can rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-30: gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dad pa la gzud par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-31: sems can gang dag mi gus shing phar mi 'dzin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11a-35: rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro mi byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-0: tshul dang mi ldan zhing mtshams las 'das pa de @11b dag bla ma la gus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-1: chos spyod pa la gzud par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-2: sems can gang dag thos pa nyung ba de dag mang du thos pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-3: ser sna can rnams ni gtong ba la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-4: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams ni tshul khrims la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-5: gnod sems can rnams ni bzod pa dang des pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-6: le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-7: brjed ngas pa rnams ni dran pa dang shes bzhin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-8: 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams ni shes rab la gzud par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-9: sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bgo bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-10: sems can nad pa rnams la sman sbyin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-11: sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-12: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-13: dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-14: des ljongs dang; ljongs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-15: ji ltar mthun par sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar mi 'gro ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-17: gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan bdun gyi bar du rjes su bstan pas sems can rnams yon tan dag la bkod pa las yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:11b-19: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des sems can de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-0: des thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha @12a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-2: tshig 'di skad ces ji srid du sems can gdul dka' ba rmu rgod de dag yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-4: bdag gis ni de dag gi phyir go cha bgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-5: sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-6: g-yo med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-7: sgyu med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-8: tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-9: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag gis go cha ma bgos kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-10: ci nas bdag gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-11: sems can rnams kyis bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-12: dad pa thob par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:12a-14: de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:22a-10: des bu de rgyur byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:22a-11: ji lta ji lta bur de la sdug par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:22a-13: des yang 'di ltar 'di yang gud nas 'ongs la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:22b-2: 'gro ba lnga rnams su mdza' ba las kyang mi mdza' bar 'gyur bar bdag ni ji ltar su dang yang mdza' ba'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:22b-23: bdag ni dngos po 'di dang gdon mi za bar 'bral bar yang 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:23a-5: 'chi ba'i dus bya'o; ;'di yongs su btang na bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems kun nas zin te gnas par mi 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:23a-10: gal te de ltar bsams kyang dngos po de gtong ma nus na des slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis go bar bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:31b-4: gang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dge slong na ba zhig mthong na des rang gi sha dang khrag gis kyang dge slong de nad de las gso bar bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:31b-8: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sngon du yang byang chub kyi sems 'gro bar bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:32a-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:35b-15: dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-0: nga yi nga @36b med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-1: mal cha lhug par gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-2: dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba dang ma bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-3: gnas rnams su don nyung zhing byed pa nyung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-4: g-yog gi tshogs 'dor zhing lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-5: dben par dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-6: las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yongs su gtang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-7: ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-8: yid la byed pa bla gab med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-9: yid la byed pa'i sgrib pa med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-11: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon par gnas pa yongs su mi gtang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-13: gal te byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa chos nyan par 'dod dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-14: slob dpon dang mkhan po blta bar 'dod dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-15: na ba dri ba'i phyir grong gi gnas su 'ongs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-16: des dgongs su slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-17: de gal te lung nod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-18: kha ton bya ba gzhan la rag las te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-19: gtsug lag khang na gnas na yang des dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyis gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:36b-20: chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa de nyid dgon pa la gnas pa yin no snyam du bsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas 'di ltar @37a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-1: bdag ci'i phyir dgon pa la gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-2: dgon pa la gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni dge sbyong ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-14: gdol pa dag kyang mang du gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-15: de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-16: ldan pa ma yin pas gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-17: dge sbyong gi don de yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-24: gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-27: mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-28: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-29: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-30: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-32: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-33: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-34: rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-35: thos pa dang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-36: tshul bzhin du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37a-37: yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-0: @37b 'bras bu thob pa rnams shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-1: skyon med par 'jug pa gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-2: dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-3: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas yang dag par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-4: rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad pas yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-5: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-6: las zad pa yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-7: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chud pas yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-9: brjod pa med pa'i chos kyis yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su thob pas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-11: stong pa nyid kyis mi skrag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-12: mtshan ma med pa la mi zhum pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-13: smon pa med pa la mi 'gong pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-14: bsam bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-15: don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-16: ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-17: chos la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-18: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-19: thog ma nas ma byung zhing mi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mi rtog pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:37b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas @38a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-1: 'grogs pa med par mang du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-2: des 'di ltar yang bdag ni sems can dang 'dres par mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-3: bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-4: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-5: de ltar mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-7: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-8: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'dres pa med pa dang 'grogs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-14: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-16: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs snyam du brtag par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-17: des yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38a-18: ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-0: gti mug gis 'jigs @38b shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-12: phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-13: nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-14: 'chi bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-15: lha'i bu'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-16: mi rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-17: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-18: bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-19: mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-22: rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-27: kun nas ldan pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-28: 'jig tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-29: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-32: the tshom gyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-33: sdig pa'i grogs pos 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:38b-36: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-0: ma mthong bar mthong ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag @39a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-1: go; ma thos par thos so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-2: ma dran par dran no snyam pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-3: bye brag ma phyed par bye brag phyed do snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-4: mi shes par shes so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-5: dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-6: gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-9: gzugs med pa'i khams kyis 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-10: sred pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang; skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-11: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang yi dvags kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-12: mi khom pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-13: mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-14: bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs nas dgon par 'ongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-17: mi 'grus shing rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-18: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas pas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39a-19: 'di lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag las yongs su thar bar mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-0: gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams @39b cad las rnam par grol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-3: gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med par thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-6: gang dag da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-9: de bas na bdag kyang 'di la 'jigs shing skrag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-10: 'jigs pa thams cad las ni shin tu 'da' bar 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-11: mi 'jigs pa ni rjes su thob par 'dod pas dgon pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du yongs su dpyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-13: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas la gnas pas 'di la gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-14: bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:39b-15: bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-2: bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-5: bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-6: bdag bsrung ba las skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-7: gal te dgon pa la gnas la bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ma spangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-8: bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-13: bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-16: bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-17: bdag bsrung ba yongs su ma spangs na ni bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don med par 'gyur ro snyam du bslab par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-18: bdag tu 'du shes pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-19: gzhan du 'du shes pa la yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-21: nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-22: dmigs par lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-23: phyin ci log tu lta ba ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-25: mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes pa la yang dgon pa la gnas pa med na nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi 'du shes can lta ci smos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-27: dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40a-28: chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-0: mtshan ma thams @40b cad la mi chags par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-1: gzugs thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-5: reg bya thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-6: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-7: sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-8: 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las brgal bar gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-11: ngan ngon gyis chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-12: 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-13: dgang sla zhing gso sla bas chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-14: shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin la sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-15: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-16: smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pas thar par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-17: bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-18: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun pas ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi bar gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-19: shin tu rnam par dag pas bya ba byas par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-25: nags tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:40b-27: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la rtsva dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-6: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-8: 'di la su zhig skrag par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-9: de 'jigs shing skrag pa lta na 'di ltar lus 'di la ni bdag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-18: 'di ltar 'jigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-19: kun brtags pa yin gyi bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-20: des ji ltar dgon pa la rtsva dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-23: nags tshal gnas pa rnams nga yi ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nga yi ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad dgon pa nyid do snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-25: dgon pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa ste nga yi ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o; ;khyim bdag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41a-26: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang mthun pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-0: dgon pa la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la @41b gzhol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-1: dgon pa la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phung po tshogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-2: dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'grub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-3: dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-4: dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rab tu bsten pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:41b-5: dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis sdud pa'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-7: rgyu ba med pas gzung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-8: skye ba med pas gnas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-9: nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do snyam du rab tu slob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-11: de ltar na gang 'di ltar chos la so sor rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgya stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-14: de dag thams cad las phal cher ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-15: srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-16: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dga' la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:46b-18: brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-3: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-4: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas pa yang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-6: bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu bar 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-8: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-9: rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-10: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-14: rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-17: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi lta bar dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems @47b dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa tshangs par spyod cing gtsang ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-1: yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa mi spyod na mtshan gnyis sprod pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-2: yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-4: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang dag pa skyon med pa la mi reg cing khyim stong par zhugs nas thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-6: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa la brtson pa; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung bar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa bdag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-9: gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-11: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-12: rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-15: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-16: rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:47b-17: chos mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la yang 'jug par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-0: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das @48a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-10: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-11: de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-12: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te; pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-15: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyor ba btud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-16: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-18: rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum par mi mdzad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-19: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-21: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-0: kun dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod @48b pa byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-1: chos bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-8: khyim bdag drag shul can 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-9: bsti stang dang mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-10: dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-11: rtag tu yang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-15: rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-16: drag shul can gyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-18: rdul la ni rdul cung zad med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-19: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag bde ba la mi re ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-21: byang chub sems dpa' ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-22: sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-23: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:48b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-0: khyim bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas bskal pa bzang po 'di la sems can rab tu @49a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-1: mang po yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-2: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa stong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-3: bskal pa brgya stong du mar yang de ltar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-6: 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong la yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-13: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-14: khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la bsgrub pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-15: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-17: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-19: chos mang po rab tu thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-20: brtson 'grus zhen pas bskal pa brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de lta ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-22: de bas na bdag kyang 'di la brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-23: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la gzud par 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49a-24: bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-0: gzhan @49b yang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la dgod par 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyam par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-4: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-6: ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang yang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-12: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-14: klog pa dang mi 'bral ba de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:49b-21: rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang ba yang 'bogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyi rab tu gang ba tsam yang ri mor byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-5: slob dpon la phul nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las so sor byas te mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-9: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-10: gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang; slob mar khas blangs te bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-17: bsgrub pa 'di la yang mi gnas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-19: byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-21: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-23: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing kun chub par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50a-24: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-0: sangs rgyas kyi @50b rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing bsgrub pa 'di la yang gnas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-2: byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-4: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-5: gus pa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-8: khyim bdag drag shul can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-13: lha ma yin dang; dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-15: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-16: drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa bcu dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-17: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-18: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-001:50b-19: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab //
